评论概述: High expectations but received with hair on it
评论详情: I was quite looking forward to receiving a sweater set as the seasons are finally changing and I look forward to wearing some warmer items. Unfortunately when I opened this it appears to be a returned item that someone wore around cats or dogs and left the hair all over both pieces of this set. It is a black medium weight sweater set and it seems to be very nice to dress up or wear with sneakers for a casual fun look. I think I was just so thrown off by receiving this item with so much hair on it. The fit is about as expected. I ordered a medium but typically wear small tops and medium bottoms. As this is a looser fit style I think the baggy top is fine. The medium bottoms are true to size for a medium bottom. The top can be tucked in or layered with a jacket over it. I will do my best to lint roll the item and wash it as I don't want to deal with a return.

This is a chic and cozy ensemble that effortlessly combines style with comfort. The knit pullover sweater vest adds a trendy touch, with its relaxed fit and contemporary design. The high-waisted pants complete the set, creating a fashionable lounge set that's perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Crafted with attention to detail, the rust-colored knit material not only looks sophisticated but also feels incredibly soft against the skin. The pullover sweater vest provides a versatile layering piece, while the high-waisted pants offer a flattering silhouette and a comfortable fit. The ensemble is well-suited for various activities, from a relaxed day at home to a casual outing with friends. The attention-grabbing rust hue adds warmth and vibrancy to the outfit, making it a standout choice for fall and winter.

评论概述: Cozy Comfort Meets Chic Style in TIQOJE's Sweater Vest Set!
评论详情: I recently snagged the TIQOJE Women's Two Piece Outfit, and let me tell ya, it's a game-changer! The knit pullover sweater vest paired with high-waisted pants isn't just comfy; it's stylish enough to turn heads. The fabric? Soft like a cloud, keeping me cozy on chilly days. And the fit? Just right! The pants hug in all the right places, and the vest is trendy yet timeless.  Washing it was a breeze - no shrinking or color fading. Whether I'm lounging at home or out for a casual meet-up, this set has become my go-to. Plus, the versatility! You can mix and match with other pieces in your wardrobe. Talk about value for money!  Overall, TIQOJE's got a winner here. Comfort, style, and quality all in one? Yes, please! Five stars, highly recommend! 🌟👌🏼

I absolutely love this outfit. It's so comfy and looks nice. Perfect if you want to look put together but also feel like you're wearing pajamas.
